pullRequest.title: Include array classes in GetClassLoaderClasses
pullRequest.bodyText:
GetClassLoaderClasses returns the list of classes whose loading was
initiated by the given class loader, including the base type primitive
array classes. All array classes of these classes must also be returned.
Fixes: #9965
[ci skip]
Signed-off-by: Graham Chapman graham_chapman@ca.ibm.com

beforeCommit.message:
Include array classes in GetClassLoaderClasses

GetClassLoaderClasses returns the list of classes whose loading was
initiated by the given class loader. Array classes defined by the loader
must be considered to be initiated from it.

Fixes: #9965

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Graham Chapman <graham_chapman@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Can you cache the vm->internalVMFunctions table in a local?  A minor thing but might be a small benefit for deep array chains...
I think we've been leaning towards retiring the use of ++ for non-primitive indexes and preferring an explicit  += 1.

commit.message:
Include array classes in GetClassLoaderClasses

GetClassLoaderClasses returns the list of classes whose loading was
initiated by the given class loader, including the base type primitive
array classes. All array classes of these classes must also be returned.

Fixes: #9965
